Keygen does not work. It worked on the original release. There is no phone activation option given.
Finally got a serial number to work. Took me 10 different generated serials to get one to work.

Confirmed! Works great.
1. Just keep trying the keygen until it passes.
2. Start a new game, and choose "Pirates of the Flying Fortress".
3. Import your character.
4. Play game :)

NFO From RELOADED:

1. Unrar.
  2. Install the addon. The original Two Worlds II is required.
  3. Start the game offline* and use the keygen from the Crack dir on the disc
     to activate using the phone method.
  4. Play the game.
  5. Support the software developers. If you like this game, BUY IT!

  * We recommend using a firewall on all executables. Remember that the game
    has 2 executables.
As I stated it works but it may take you more than 5 serials to get one to work. That's the problem not the instructions.
